name: hj-video-intro-animator
description: Video intro/transition text animation tool I made for my videos using JS and Electron.

scripts.pack-w32: electron-packager . video-intro-animator --overwrite --asar=true --platform=win32 --arch=ia32 --icon=via.ico --prune=true --out=release-builds --ignore=via\.png --ignore=presets --ignore=old --ignore=templates\.json --ignore=user\.json --version-string.CompanyName="HJfod" --version-string.FileDescription="Video Intro Animator" --version-string.ProductName="Video Intro Animator"

author: HJfod
